An intern encrypted two secrets with RSA, but accidentally used the same prime twice. Here's one ciphertext: 37145050916938973712710945530094755968303919629562607480848193094418486308223935366826412254689128340116354380852942219558827302317967214460304613420016739706249077743786539322949295420432662375173671138066338131969178947567718340. Can you recover the private key?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1007721191623631456396247815861806435227238951681941927582066633591508712924831384203538769372199962626531659228951385440911782523151289729878444788008163929727412922813151558522350686255303017267272112187917060695226918031120071241, e=401238768855888357472634041575957596817695400556968678039534869677052921582631112624818626966058658700607917493451354401824771961591309088887562049130175524907523182238999747618313457949811355169775936749768629772660303590475709503

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{xluocgj7}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 37145050916938973712710945530094755968303919629562607480848193094418486308223935366826412254689128340116354380852942219558827302317967214460304613420016739706249077743786539322949295420432662375173671138066338131969178947567718340
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1007721191623631456396247815861806435227238951681941927582066633591508712924831384203538769372199962626531659228951385440911782523151289729878444788008163929727412922813151558522350686255303017267272112187917060695226918031120071241, e=401238768855888357472634041575957596817695400556968678039534869677052921582631112624818626966058658700607917493451354401824771961591309088887562049130175524907523182238999747618313457949811355169775936749768629772660303590475709503
extra_info: p=31744624609902563098796056639084796035458035217750599391515910166697853301783395174871917492727962749508431465148829, q=31744624609902563098796056639084796035458035217750599391515910166697853301783395174871917492727962749508431465148829, Ï†(n)=1007721191623631456396247815861806435227238951681941927582066633591508712924831384203538769372199962626531659228951321951662562718025092137765166618416093013656977421614368526702017290548699450476922368352931604769727901168189773584
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
